EmailTemplate.name: 2019_05_C&PS_CSM_Email.Ladd_2019_05
EmailTemplate.subject: Vote For Us in AIN | Customer Experience Amplified
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell Customer Connect
Dear Honeywell Customer: The Aviation International News (AIN) Survey was released on May 1. Our goal is to achieve top marks in this survey and we need your feedback to make this happen. -- David Honeywell takes AIN and other industry surveys seriously, therefore we have worked on several improvements.
- Added more Field Service Engineers worldwide, like James Lee <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2018/april/honeywell-engineer-goes-the-distance-to-connect-with-customers]]> (Satcom) and John Sanner <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/april/helicopter-technical-support-leader-is-a-breed-apart]]> (Engines). - Enhanced our Direct Access App, empowering customers to get the support they need faster. - Increased Operator Conferences events to meet face to face with our customers globally. Register Here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/january/2019-operator-conferences]]> for an event near you. - Launched our Technical Knowledge Center with more than 8,000 knowledge articles that help customers resolve issues. Find Articles <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/support/technical-support]]>
Your experience matters > VOTE NOW <[[https://www.ainonline.com/product-support-survey]]> Want to learn more? Click Here <[[http://www.aerospace.honeywell.com/customersupport]]>
David If you need additional customer support, I am your point of contact. Please reach me at:
David Ladd Mobile: 913-222-9283 Email: David.ladd@honeywell.com <[[mailto:David.ladd@honeywell.com]]>
